_header: Jesu to his disciples told / Words good for to hold
Subjects: Thomas of Canterbury, saint; sermon texts, Gospel
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo sancti Thome Cant.’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu to his disciplus toldeWordus gode forte
                    holde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat we may to þat blisse beo brouhtÞat for
                    goode men is wrouht. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Nisi granum frumenti cadens in terra (f. 219vb)
